This a movie that has a lot of skeptism against it for plenty of reasons. There are a lot of things it needs to make work in live-action that seem like it would only work in animation. We've got a look at the dragons, and they look pretty good, but the dragon riding is another thing they have to make look incredible, or this film isn't going to work.
